description:
Bask in the charm of this quiet and spacious UWS apartment with exposed brick and a fireplace. Located on West 81st Street between Amsterdam and Columbus.

My place is a short walk to Central Park, the American Museum of Natural History, and the Metropolitan Museum of Art.

Walk southwest to the 1 train in under 5 minutes. Walk east to the B/C trains in under 5 minutes.

Perfect for couples or groups of 2-3 friends.

Note: the apartment is a 5th floor walk-up

There are multiple NYC guidebooks in the apartment (in English only).
name: Large 1BR in the Heart of the UWS
review: We were thrilled to find a one-bedroom at this price and in this location.  It was exactly as described, comfortable, and very clean.  We had a wonderful stay and would gladly stay here again.
